attributes.action: pass the bill rehabilitation of offenders act
attributes.additional_details: The rehabilitation of offenders act has been place in front of the parliament twice in the past but it has been stop because of no time has been spend after the third read. This is a urgent required for the act to be updated. It effect many people who seeking a second chance in their life. With the current act they have disadvantage everywhere they go. This will effect employment rate, economic. So please sign the petition and make a better and open future
